title: dayajUDa manci
sahitya:
dayajUDa manci samayamidE vEvEgamE vacci


anupallavi

  jayamosagE shankarI nIvu jananigadA brhadambA


caraNam 1    kanakAngi nI pada kamalamE dikkani namminAnu nEnu 
sanaka sanandana vandita caraNA sArasa nEtri  nIvugadA
    caraNam 2    saphalamanyu dIrcya khaNDa sAmrAjya mIyavE 
kapaTamu sEyakanE nigamanuvitA kAmita dAyaki nIvugadA
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa sOdari kaumArI sakalAgama pUjitE dEvI 
nI mahimalu pogaDa taramA nI samAnamendugAnanE
